name: Mastermind
description: Your focus is on people and the influence and secrets they have.

3.name: Master of Intrigue
3.description: Gain proficiency with the disguise kit, the forgery kit, and one gaming set; learn two languages and can mimic speech patterns.

3.name: Master of Tactics
3.description: You can use the Help action as a bonus action, and when you aid an ally attacking a creature, the target can be within 30 feet of you.

9.name: Insightful Manipulator
9.description: After observing a creature for 1 minute outside combat, learn how it compares to you in key abilities or levels.

13.name: Misdirection
13.description: When an attack targets you while a creature within 5 feet provides cover, you can have the attack target that creature instead.

17.name: Soul of Deceit
17.description: Your thoughts can't be read, you can present false thoughts, and magic can't compel you to tell the truth.
